public class AddProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class for JavaFX addPartForm controller. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT Create separate controller classes for each form. Modify auto generated IDs to allow reuse of deleted IDs. Move exception warnings to point of entry for each text field.
